name: Arklicks
description:
Quite simple and straightforward, click the generate LMD button to make money, then click Recruit Operator to get some Operators to help you gain more money! Boost your click crit chance with the sanity button, and be sure to utilize your operator's abilities (if they have one) for maximum efficiency. Try to discover all the operators! (17 in total)

KNOWN BUGS:

-Don't restart the game with a full board, you won't be able to recruit anybody

-Unfortunately, sometimes, when you sell an operator, the next recruitment will spawn an operator on top of or behind another operator. Good for if you wanna just make more money, but can ruin the experience. Sorry if this happens :((

(Happens more when you sell with a full board)
